text: jab allaah ne kaha, "ai eesa! main tujhe apane qabje mein le loonga aur tujhe apanee or utha loonga aur avishvaasiyon (kee kucheshtaon) se tujhe paak kar doonga aur tere anuyaayiyon ko qiyaamat ke din tak logon ke oopar rakhoonga, jinhonne inakaar kiya. phir meree or tumhen lautana hai. phir main tumhaare beech un cheezon ka faisala kar doonga, jinake vishay mein tum vibhed karate rahe ho
